text: batahira sanskruthiyata eka kala nohakiwunath iwa nathi nokara gena laukika diyunuwak laba gatha haki wiya yuthuya
me atharathura niyojya kathanayakawarayata thunduwak labini.

diwi naguma sanwardhana wadasatahan kalamanakaranaya saha pa්rathipaththi sambandhayen departhamenthuwata sahaya wanu was, ekolos denekugen samanwitha diwi naguma jathika mandalayak da pihituwanu labe.

wiwahaya bindawatunu athara ohu purnakalinawa deshapalanayata yomu wi muslim janathawata wenama rajyayak laba ganime satane peramuna gaththeya. 1947 agosthu 14 ohuge nayakathwaya yatathe pakisthanaya bihi wiya.
enam “wiwidha roga, duka sankawa, kansiya” wani dukkhadayi therumakata adala we.
in pasu owun da kusalatha layisthuwata ek karanu labayi.

ee hariyatama 1924 wasare aprel 18 wenidaya.

ee thamayi pathali, sarala aandu wirodhi tharkanaye godurak nowi, ee wagema pathali, sarala aanduwadi tharkanaye gobilek nowi kohomada, jathiye eela`ga janawarama, nisimanga nirmanaya karana paththata harawanne, edesata pragnyawa wadawalanne, edesata jathiye hada manasa wiwrutha karawanne, kiyana eka.me abhiyogaya jaya ganima sandaha wu purwa sakachchawak thamayi api me ada sidu karamin sitinne.

sruthumaya thathwayan ida dena thak kal, api widya katayuthu departhamenthuwa lesa apage una kriyakarakam digatama karagena yanu atha.
ema panthi pahen pasuwa jawipe kadarwarayata sidu wune thama pudgalika hakiyawan warga anuwa wiplawaya sadaha adala karyaya kotas sidu kirimaya.
me kriyawali pilibanda adhyayanaya saha ee mangin karmanthawalata, saha wenath nishpadana kriyawalinta ewani prathikriya dayaka kara ganimata me hadarim itha wadagath wenawa.

un wahanseda pasuwa kalyamekin wammika suthra deshanawen bana asa arahathwayata pamini seka.

shri lankawa prajathanthrawadi sampradayan sahitha, siyalu purawasiyange manawa himikam surakina, samajaye pawathina bahu wargika, bahu sanskruthika, bahu aagamika ha bahu bhashikathwaya agaya karana deshayak bawa ehidi adahas dakwamin amathya mangala samarawira mahatha penwa di atha.
haffe ithin wena kawuda inne mage wirayane affa me [boru].

ma meya idiripath karanne kisidu ahankarayakin thorawa ha pa්raja wagakima pilibandawa awabodhayakin yukthawath mage hrudaya sakshiya pariksha kota balimen ha ma garu karana mage sahodara ratawasiyange adahaswalata sawan dimen pasuwathya.
duppath sisunta daragatha nohaki rupiyal miliyana dekak pamana wana ihala gasthu danatamath injineru wani samahara patamala sandaha aya karanu labayi.
dan mama lapath ekka kussiya langa..
api adata wela thaniyama yoniya athagagena suranthaya gaththa.

sandakle - denisli dumriya marga marga prathisanskarana wyapruthi dumriya marga prathisanskarana wyapruthi adhikshana ha upadeshana sewa sandekle - daslar - denisli dumriya sthana athara adhiwegi dumriya wyapruthiya ismir saha denisli hi darukamata hada ganimata niyamithaya amathara dumriyak ismayil densili dumriya margaya denisli-ismir dumriya sewa wadi wiya denisli saha ismir athara adhiwegi dumriya

swabhawika wyasana[sanskaranaya] samanyeyan rataka athiwana swabhawitha wipath da sanskruthiya hadagasima kere balapayi.niranthara bhumikampa walata hasuwana japanaye niwasa thananne bhumi kampawalata oroththu dena ayurini.niranthara wali kunatu athiwana arabiye shariraya hodin aawaranayawana adum adithi.nayayam athiwala pradeshawala wesena janaya niwasa thanaganime di bhumiye pihitima anugamanaya karamin niwasa thanagani.
